properties.areaDesc: DeSoto, MS; Crittenden, AR; Shelby, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 6:49PM CST until February 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for most of the Mississippi River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Memphis
* from Wednesday February 19 until Thursday February 27.
* At 6 PM Monday the stage was 32.6 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 35.0 feet on Friday February 21.
* Flood stage is 34.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Wednesday February 19 and
continue to rise to near 35.0 feet by Friday February 21.The river
will fall below flood stage by Thursday February 27.
* At 36.0 feet...In Tennessee, water is edging onto Fullen Dock Area.
Roads on the north side of the Loosahatchie River near its mouth
are beginning to flood. Riverside Park Marina begins to flood.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
